name: 1dplot.py
author: AFNI Team
description: This program is for making images to visualize columns of numbers from 1D text files. It uses Python, particularly matplotlib, to create plots.

inputs.description: One or more file names of text files. Each column in this file will be treated as a separate time series for plotting.
inputs.name: Input files

inputs.description: Output filename or prefix. Default output image type is .jpg
inputs.name: Output prefix

inputs.description: See helpfile
inputs.name: Help

inputs.description: A fun feature to show an additional boxplot adjacent to each time series
inputs.name: Boxplot on

inputs.description: Adjust view for boxplots when using censoring
inputs.name: Boxplot view

inputs.description: Fill the plot frame completely, thus no labels, frame, or titles will be visible
inputs.name: Margin off

inputs.description: Provide a list of scales to apply to the y-values
inputs.name: Scale

inputs.description: One way to input x-values explicitly: as a "1D" file containing a single file of numbers
inputs.name: X file

inputs.description: Provide exactly 3 numbers for x-values: start, stop, and stepsize
inputs.name: X values

inputs.description: Optional range for each 'infile' y-axis
inputs.name: Y axis

inputs.description: Optional text labels for each 'infile' column
inputs.name: Y labels

inputs.description: allows y-axis labels to wrap into multiple rows, each of length <= which the user can decide
inputs.name: Y labels max length

inputs.description: Turn on the plotting of a legend in the plot(s)
inputs.name: Legend on

inputs.description: Optional legend labels, if using '-legend_on'
inputs.name: Legend labels

inputs.description: Optional legend locations, if using '-legend_on'
inputs.name: Legend locations

inputs.description: Optional text labels for the abscissa/x-axis
inputs.name: X label

inputs.description: Optional title for the set of plots
inputs.name: Title

inputs.description: Reverses the order of plotted time series
inputs.name: Reverse order

inputs.description: Make each graph have its own y-range
inputs.name: Separate scale

inputs.description: Plot multiple infiles in a single subplot
inputs.name: One graph

inputs.description: Choose the output image's DPI. Default value is 150
inputs.name: DPI

inputs.description: Choose the output image's dimensions (units are inches)
inputs.name: Figure size

inputs.description: Change image fontsize; default is 10
inputs.name: Font size

inputs.description: Change font-family used; default is monospace
inputs.name: Font family

inputs.description: Add a specific font name; should match with chosen font-family
inputs.name: Font styles

inputs.description: Decide what color(s) to cycle through in plots (one or more)
inputs.name: Colors

inputs.description: Specify run lengths for background patches to distinguish runs
inputs.name: Patches

inputs.description: Specify time points where censoring has occurred using AFNI index notation
inputs.name: Censor TRs

inputs.description: Specify time points where censoring has occurred using one or more 1D files
inputs.name: Censor files

inputs.description: Add a dotted horizontal line to the plot, representing the censor threshold
inputs.name: Censor horizontal line

inputs.description: Choose the color of the censoring background; default is: [1, 0.7, 0.7]
inputs.name: Censor RGB

inputs.description: Change the background color outside of the plot windows. Default is 0.9
inputs.name: Background color
